data.name: Everyday Account
data.description: Our simple, intuitive everyday transaction account, made even better for you with user-friendly features that help you make the most of your money.

features.additionalInfo: Make transactions all from the palm of your hand. Make your money mobile and pay on the go with Apple Pay, Samsung Pay or Google Pay
No overdrawn fees if you happen to overdraw your account. Conditions apply.
No withdrawal fees at over 10,000 ATMs

Manage your money easily. Set spending budgets on specific categories like groceries, bills and more. And get personalised insights and real-time alerts all in the palm of your hands with our handy banking app.
Grow your savings whenever you spend. Round up debit card transactions to the nearest dollar and we'll put the extra change straight into one of your savings accounts.
Never miss a payment on your everyday bills or recurring transactions. We'll give you a heads up when your bills are due, so you can make sure you've got the funds available.
Make payments and transactions in real-time. Send and receive money in an instant with PayID enabled accounts.
We've made monthly account keeping fees on your Everyday Account a thing of the past.

eligibility.additionalInfo: A citizen or permanent resident of Australia
A smartphone that supports iOS 12.0+ or Android 8.0+.
An Australian drivers licence or Australian passport or Medicare card
Applying for a personal account and not in the name of a business or trust. There should be no more than two account holders for this account
Fourteen (14) years of age or over

fees.name: BPAY, Pay Someone, Card Transactions
fees.additionalInfo: There is no fee charged by BOQ for performing a BPAY Payment, Pay Anyone or making a Card transaction. Merchants may charge fee in respect of card transactions which should be advised to you at the time of making the transaction.

fees.name: Cheque Dishonour
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each Cheque deposit that is dishonoured on the same day that the dishonour takes place.

fees.name: Failed Transaction Dispute
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when a transaction dispute is unsuccessful.

fees.name: Debit Interest Rate (applied to overdrawn Accounts)
fees.additionalInfo: Interest is charged on a daily basis on all debit balances and debited to the relevant Account monthly.

fees.name: Trace
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each request to perform a trace on any transaction type.

fees.name: International Emergency Card Replacement
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when we courier a card to you internationally.

fees.name: Domestic ATM Withdrawal/ Balance Enquiry Fee
fees.additionalInfo: We don't charge a fee to withdraw cash or check your account balance, however the ATM owner may charge a fee which should be displayed on the screen before proceeding with the withdrawal.

fees.name: Currency Conversion
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged for any International Transaction which includes: any transaction made in a foreign currency; or when any transaction is processed outside of Australia (in Australian dollars or a foreign currency). It is calculated as a percentage of the Australian dollar equivalent.

fees.name: Paper Statement - International
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each paper statement that is required to be posted to an International Address.

fees.name: Bank Cheque
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each bank cheque that is produced and posted to an Australian address.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each direct debit that is dishonoured on the same day that the dishonour takes place.

fees.name: International Balance Enquiry
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when a balance enquiry is performed at an ATM outside of Australia. A fee may also be charged by the ATM owner which should be displayed on the screen before proceeding with the enquiry or associated withdrawal.

fees.name: Monthly Account Keeping
fees.additionalInfo: There are no monthly account keeping fees with myBOQ Accounts.

fees.name: Overdrawn Account
fees.additionalInfo: There is no overdrawn fee, however a debit interest rate is applied as set out below.

fees.name: Manual Statement
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you request a manual statement to be generated and emailed to you. Statements are available on the myBOQ App and can be accessed for closed Accounts at no cost.Statements for periods prior to migration of an Account to the myBOQ app will not be available from the myBOQ app, but can be requested from BOQ.

fees.name: Unclaimed Monies
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when the unclaimed monies process starts which is after 7 years of inactivity.

fees.name: International ATM Withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when a withdrawal is performed at an ATM outside of Australia. A fee may also be charged by the ATM owner and should be displayed on the screen before proceeding with the withdrawal.

fees.name: Domestic Emergency Card Replacement
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when we courier a card to you within Australia.

fees.name: Electronic Transaction Error Correction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when the bank is requested by you or the recipient Financial Institution or Biller, to correct an error you have made with a BPAY payment, using the 'Pay Someone' functionality, or NPP transaction.
